data.title: Kandahar vs San Antonio Del Tachira Climate & Distance Between
data.text:
The distance between Kandahar, Afghanistan and San Antonio Del Tachira, Venezuela is approximately 13,789 km or 8,569 mi.

To reach Kandahar in this distance one would set out from San Antonio Del Tachira bearing 43.2° or NE and follow the great circles arc to approach Kandahar bearing 127.3&deg or SE .

Kandahar has a subtropical hot steppe climate (BSh) whereas San Antonio Del Tachira has a tropical wet and dry/ savanna climate with dry summers (As).

Kandahar is in or near the warm temperate desert scrub biome whereas San Antonio Del Tachira is in or near the subtropical moist forest biome.

The annual mean temperature is 7.4 °C (13.3°F) cooler.

Average monthly temperatures vary by 24.3 °C (43.7°F) more in Kandahar. The continentality subtype is subcontinental as opposed to extremely hyperoceanic.

Total annual precipitation averages 562.4 mm (22.1 in) less which is equivalent to 562.4 l/m² (13.8 US gal/ft²) or 5,624,000 l/ha (601,243 US gal/ac) less. About 1/4 as much.

The altitude of the sun at midday is overall 15.5° lower in Kandahar than in San Antonio Del Tachira.

Relative humidity levels are 33.8% lower.

The mean dew point temperature is 17.4°C (31.3°F) lower.
